response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled performance and value. We believe it's worth more than its face value, but we're open to discussing a fair price. Given its quality and unique features, I propose an offer of $15,000 for this product. I understand that its true value may be subjective, but I'm confident that you'll appreciate its benefits. Let's discuss how we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.", "product_price": 15000}
